TopicTitle: Totally Stock UNSC The Heart of Midlothian Mark I

Articles.Content:
UNSC Replica Destroyer MKI.

Separate from the Sky Breaker in the last post of this whole thread.

Select the command module in the long MAC cannon to control here, the MAC cannon number one has it. The UNSC The Heart of Midlothian is complete. The armor system consists of a dual-redundant spaced armor system all connected to a central spine with multiple points of reinforcement. It also has long range due to nuclear engines and high survivability due to the reinforced low profile bridge along with two docking ports and 4 dedicated retro thrusters and 4 dedicated prograde thrusters along with two MAC cannon ports for two MAC cannons. (Design has been tweaked a bit from these pictures. MAC cannon fires MAC rounds at 450 m/s.) Enjoy!

Updated Download With Weapons and a fuel flow glitch has been fixed: https://www.dropbox.com/s/pekxo375fgpwhuc/UNSC%20The%20Heart%20of%20Midlothian.craft

holy. those are some nice replicas, however I just hope your infinity is scaled down...... a lot. by about 1m:60m. because the infinity is meant to be 3.5 KM long so..... any way, keep up the good work, they look very good.

UNSC Sky Breaker Prototype. 349 parts and 118.87 tons makes for a much more lighter and efficient vessel, especially with four high thrust thrust vectoring engines along with enhanced armor and flexibility.
